overview:
Liz Cuccinello serves as General Counsel and Director of Administration at House Party.

In these roles she wears many hats, handling all of the companyâ€™s legal and compliance needs while also managing its human resource department.

Liz has over 12 years experience as in-house counsel, with special expertise in contract negotiations, partnerships, social media concerns and general compliance.

Prior to joining House Party, Liz worked as General Counsel for several start-up and growth stage companies, also assisting with strategic direction, partnerships and administration.

Liz graduated from Fordham University as an English major/Psychology minor. She earned her JD from the Pace University School of Law.

Liz lives in Rockland County with her husband Pete and their 4 children.
